response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13,500. I trust this offer will be appealing to you, considering the substantial worth of the product to you stands at $12,000. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 13500}
